text: ākāśagaḷalli mattu bhūmiyalliruva ellavū allāhanigē sērive. ‘‘Allāhanige an̄jiri. Nīvu dhikkārigaḷādare, ākāśagaḷalli mattu bhūmiyalliruva ellavū allāhanigē sērive (embudannu mareyabēḍi)’’ endu ī hinde grantha nīḍalāgiddavarige nāvu upadēśisiddevu mattu nimagū upadēśisuttiddēve. Allāhanantū ella agatyagaḷinda muktanū ella praśansegaḷige ar'hanū āgiruvanu
